title: Document Lab Quality Control
description: At the beginning of a shift, a lab technician must run quality control (QC) samples on an analyzer and document the results.

tasks.description: Run the low, medium, and high QC samples on the analyzer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician physically runs the QC materials.

tasks.description: Review the QC results in the LIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The results from the QC samples are displayed for review.

tasks.description: Confirm that all QC results are within the acceptable range and approve the QC run.
tasks.expected_outcome: The QC is documented as passed, and the analyzer is cleared to run patient samples.
